decisions.name: Have_the_fees_been_recorded_yet
decisions.label: Have the fees been recorded yet?

Flow.description: This flow will be used as a central flow for planners to access all subsequent recommendation types, in order to keep the UI clean.
Flow.label: Recommendation | coordinate set up

fields.name: explanation
fields.fieldText: What would you like to do next?

value.stringValue: Create a new kind of recommendation

fields.name: explain4
fields.fieldText: If you press the button above you'll be taken to the screen that allows you to select which type of recommendation you'd like to set up next. If you're all done, click Finish.

fields.name: uhoh
fields.fieldText:
Something seems to have gone wrong here. Please let the product team know - tell them you tried to set up a recommendation called {!typeSelect.firstSelectedRow.Name}.

I'll let you try again.

fields.name: text
fields.fieldText:
Welcome to the home of recommendations!


Please choose the recommendation type you'd like to set up below.

Once you've set up all of this type that you'd like, you'll come back here to choose the next type.

fields.name: warning
fields.fieldText: Please do not exit out of this flow unless you do not wish for any of your recommendations to be saved - always click 'Next' or 'Finish'.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_text
fields.fieldText:
Choose from the list of recommendation types that are available for {!Get_advice.AdviceType__r.Name}.


If you close this wizard part way through, no recommendations will be created.
